com.cloudera.gertrude.server

Interface HttpServletExperimentState

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ExperimentState

    public interface HttpServletExperimentState
extends ExperimentState
    An extension to the ExperimentState interface that can be implemented by any concrete subclass of AbstractExperimentState that can return a HttpServletRequest object.

    Separating the concrete implementation in HttpServletExperimentStateImpl from the HttpServletExperimentState interface allows clients to re-use any Condition instances that only need to know about the HttpServletRequest, not the details of how experiments are diverted for that state.
